iv got 1 more ques to ask .. 

im in search of a software which can add 2 or multiple files of the format , in the same format they are .
i dont want to "convert" them i just want to "join" the same kind [format,video size ,video bit rate,audio bitrate] of files .
is thr any software like tht ?? plz help me whoever knows .
thanx

being more clear [as my english isnt gud]

for eg iv downloaded joey's season 1 - thr in mobile size avi format , v small size ,30 mb per file .

i wanna just "join" some or all file togther without "re-converting" them .. 

so what should i do ?

@htctouch: With VirtalDub
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VirtualDub
open first avi file than click on File>Append AVI segment for the next avi, than the same for the next and so on.
Set Video>Direct stream copy and Audio>Direct stream copy. At the end, save such new file, comprised of smaller avi files with File>Save as AVI.
VirtualDub can join AVI files with "normal" MP3 audio track. For avi files with VBR mp3 audio tracks you should use Avidemux
http://fixounet.free.fr/avidemux/download.html
and do very similar things.
For joining avi files with AC3 audio one must install AC3 ACM codec.
http://fcchandler.home.comcast.net/~fcchandler/AC3ACM/
All is free and zillions of tutorials exists on line. Just Google.
